adds an edge to the Graph, that is, a connection between two vertices

Time Complexity:
O(log|E|)
Parameters
srcindex of the source vertex
destindex of the destination vertex
weightcost of the connection

◆ getMST()

list< Edge * > UGraph::getMST ( )

computes a Minimum Spanning Tree (MST) of the Graph, using an implementation of Prim's algorithm

Time Complexity:
O(|E| * log|V|)
Returns
list containing the edges that belong to the MST
